mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERSHIP_SUSPEND_HISTORY ( SUSPEND_ID, MEMBERSHIP_ID, SUSPEND_START_DATE, SUSPEND_END_DATE, SUSPEND_REASON, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY ) VALUES ( SEQ_SUSPEND_ID.NEXTVAL, #{membershipId}, #{suspendStartDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{suspendEndDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{suspendReason}, SYSDATE, #{createdBy} )
mapper.select:
SELECT s.SUSPEND_ID, s.MEMBERSHIP_ID, s.SUSPEND_START_DATE, s.SUSPEND_END_DATE, s.SUSPEND_REASON, s.CREATED_BY, s.CREATED_AT, s.UPDATED_BY, s.UPDATED_AT,
mem.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBERSHIP_TYPE, ca.ADMIN_ID AS CREATED_BY_NAME, ua.ADMIN_ID AS UPDATED_BY_NAME FROM MEMBERSHIP_SUSPEND_HISTORY s JOIN MEMBERSHIP m ON s.MEMBERSHIP_ID = m.MEMBERSHIP_ID JOIN MEMBER mem ON m.MEMBER_ID = s.MEMBER_ID JOIN ADMIN ca s.CREATED_BY = ca.ADMIN_ID LEFT JOIN ADMIN ua s.UPDATED_BY = ua.ADMIN_ID ORDER BY SUSPEND_ID DESC
